The chunk introduces the concept of `DirectRadioButton` in Panda3D's GUI system, explaining its similarity to check buttons but with exclusive selection functionality. This sets the stage for detailed keyword definitions and usage examples that follow in the document.

DirectRadioButton

DirectRadioButtons are similar to check buttons, except only one button is selected when it is clicked. Their usage is almost identical to regular buttons, except that the text area and box area can be modified separately.
